source_text: Under the SPA, the total consideration for 100% beneficial ownership of the tenements from JV partners St Barbara Limited and Plowden (the Sellers) is up to $140,768 plus a maximum 2% net smelter return royalty.
additional_details: The royalty is a maximum 2% net smelter return royalty. It is part of the consideration for 100% beneficial ownership of the tenements. Bulletin (the acquirer) pays it to the Sellers (St Barbara Limited and Plowden).
